sponsors.name: Blockscout
sponsors.description: Use Blockscout’s APIs, SDK, or Merits system to integrate blockchain data, improve UX, and qualify for bounty tracks.

sponsors.name: 1inch
sponsors.description: Enhance your app with 1inch’s swap and limit order protocols, cross-chain capabilities, and trading APIs.

sponsors.name: LayerZero
sponsors.description: Build cross-chain workflows using LayerZero’s messaging, composability, and lzRead data query infrastructure.

sponsors.name: Flow
sponsors.description: Deploy scalable, consumer-friendly dApps or cross-chain DeFi strategies using Flow’s EVM and Cadence platforms.

sponsors.name: Pyth Network
sponsors.description: Use Pyth’s Entropy RNG or price feeds for real-time, verifiable data in games, DeFi, or prediction apps.

sponsors.name: Flare Network
sponsors.description: Leverage Flare’s secure random numbers, time series oracles, and Web2 attestation for hybrid dApps.

sponsors.name: Hedera
sponsors.description: Build fast, secure apps with Hedera’s AI kits, smart contracts, and unique services like HTS and HCS.

sponsors.name: Vlayer
sponsors.description: Create smart contracts using email proofs, web proofs, or historic/cross-chain data via ZK infrastructure.

sponsors.name: World
sponsors.description: Build mini apps for 23M+ World App users using Minikit SDK and the World Chain infrastructure.

sponsors.name: Rootstock
sponsors.description: Deploy EVM dApps on Bitcoin via Rootstock; build DeFi tools, automations, or cross-chain integrations.

sponsors.name: Yellow
sponsors.description: Use ERC-7824 and Nitrolite to build fast, low-cost apps with state channels and protocol contributions.

sponsors.name: Beraborrow
sponsors.description: Develop smart CDP modules or vault strategies that enhance Beraborrow’s LSP and NECT token economics.

sponsors.name: Protocol Labs
sponsors.description: Power ethical AI systems and fair data economies using Filecoin, Akave, and decentralized storage tools.

sponsors.name: Hardhat
sponsors.description: Build with Hardhat’s newest alpha tools, including Solidity tests, multi-chain support, and Rust rewrite.
